response.overview: With Vladimir Putin facing down a mutiny, FRONTLINE examines how the Russian leader reached this moment of crisis. Veteran filmmaker Michael Kirk and his team examine the story of Putin’s rise, his clashes at home and abroad, and how his troubled Ukraine war led to the greatest threat yet to his grip on power.  (PBS FRONTLINE)  DIRECTED BY: Michael Kirk PRODUCED BY: Michael Kirk  Mike Wiser  Vanessa Fica
response.title: Putin’s Crisis
